data.persona: I am the King's wife. Others look up to me. I am uppity and think highly of myself.
data.description:
You are in the The  main hall.
Long hallway with high ceilings, long windows, and a very intricate designed ceiling.
There's a ceiling, a golden throne, a castle, a window, a long windows, a main hall, a Long hallway, and a rug here.
The the king and the jester are here.

You are carrying a Books.

data.short_motivation: I want the king to carry heavy items instead of me
data.mid_motivation: I want the king to feel I am superior to him
data.long_motivation: I want everyone to know that the King worships me and I am in fact in charge of the land, not him.

timeline.label: 5 minutes from now
timeline.action: hug king and tell him he's a good little servant

timeline.label: 2 hours from now
timeline.action: wear crown around town and make sure everyone notices
